title.rendered: Peshawar vs Lahore, Pakistan T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Peshawar: Mohammad Haris, Babar Azam (c), Saim Ayub, Tom Kohler-Cadmore, Haseebullah Khan (wk), Rovman Powell, Aamer Jamal, Azmatullah Omarzai/James Neesham, Wahab Riaz, Arshad Iqbal, Mujeeb Ur Rahman

Lahore: Fakhar Zaman, Mirza Tahir Baig, Abdullah Shafique, Sam Billings (wk), Sikandar Raza, Hussain Talat,  David Wiese, Rashid Khan, Shaheen Afridi (c), Haris Rauf, Zaman Khan

Pitch Report

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 181

2nd innings average score: 190

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

In the previous clash between these teams, Shaheen Afridi (five for 40) and Fakhar Zaman (96 off 45) were the captain and vice-captain of the Best11 respectively.

In his very first game of the season, Haseebullah Khan smashed 50 off 29. As a matter of fact, his recent domestic form has been stunning. In the Pakistan List A Trophy, he scored 551 runs at 46 including two hundreds and three fifties.

Azmatullah Omarzai replaced James Neesham in the last encounter, and it turned out to be a great decision. The Afghan pacer produced bonus points for a three-wicket haul – of which two wickets came with the new ball. His Best11 percentage in the last five outings reads 80.

Rovman Powell has been a powerful performer in fantasy leagues this year. Ever since the Dubai T20 League, he has hammered 493 runs at an average of 40.

One way or the other, Sikandar Raza has kept the fantasy players happy throughout the league, making it to the Best11 in five of seven games: 177 runs and four wickets.

Wahab Riaz is the top wicket-taker (19) for Peshawar against Lahore. In his last 10 outings, he took two four-wicket hauls.

Rashid Khan’s best figures (five for 20) in the league came against Peshawar. He is yet to go wicketless in the ongoing season, and has registered the top score of 20.
